Name: Achilles Heel
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: If you like French Martinis you'll love this semi-sweet Tatanka.
History: Created in 2005 at Koba, Brighton, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Achilles Heel contains 212 calories
